name: RESIZE (itch) (Austerius)
description:
Swipe your finger to the right or left - change the size of the big blue disc in the middle and catch green balls, falling from above. Avoid red dots and prepare yourself to the greater challenge with each level increase of your BASE. How long can you survive? How sharp your skills are?

Compete with friends and other player for the first positions on the leaderboard, or simply enjoy colorful graphic and pleasant music. And all this is totally free!

Other game features:

  • 14 discs with special powers;
  • Each disc falling with different velocity(increased per level);
  • Leader board and achievements;
  • Designed in Material style;
  • High quality graphics and smooth animation;
  • Cool soundtracks and sound effects;
  • Cloud game saves(sync with Google account);
